siteDescription: Create surveys and polls for your Discord community.

hero.title: GET TO KNOW YOUR
hero.subtitle: with questions they want to answer!

features.title: YOU LEARN MORE WHEN PEOPLE ENJOY THE CONVERSATION.
features.subtitle: Traditional forms and surveys are boring. No one wants to answer them. With Subo, you ask questions in polls and friendly conversations that your community wants to join.

list.title: ASK QUESTIONS
content: With survey convos, members answer your questions in a private chat with Subo, inside your Discord server or on the web.
With polls, members answer your 1 public question, with multiple ways to answer and share results.

list.title: ENCOURAGE PARTICIPATION
content: Give Role rewards for answering a survey or a poll
XP system: members earn points as they answer questions, level up to unlock roles.
Display a leaderboard with your most active participants
Share findings and answers from other participants in a click

list.title: ANALYZE & SHARE RESULTS
content: View aggregated results and individual responses, privately or privately. Share/repost them in the server.
Let Subo summarize open answers with AI
Export the full data set for further analysis.

testimonialsSubTitle: â¤ï¸ by mods, community managers, creators, entrepreneurs, product, UX and insights teams.

testimonialsList.text: I love Subo! Best survey bot ever! So easy and simple to use! Any issues are dealt with swiftly by an awesome customer support person!
testimonialsList.author: obimage

testimonialsList.text: Simple and so great to use
testimonialsList.author: Judge Jaxon

testimonialsList.text: Thank you for having the best poll bot out there, seriously. I have tried a lot of them. This is by far the best.
testimonialsList.author: YeahImShady

testimonialsList.text: This app is perfect. And the support they provide is also top notch. Highly recommended if you're doing any type of poll, survey, or voting
testimonialsList.author: .dutty

testimonialsList.text: This is the best polling solution on Discord currently. The setup is intuitive and not once caused me any issues. Having managed a server of over a thousand participants and needing something specific for anonymous voting with anonymous results, this was the perfect bot where no other poll solution bots did the job. It can listen to Integrations roles (something larger bots such as carl & MEE6 cannot do), you can set specific role restrictions, and even multiple choice surveys. Alongside that, its support team is top notch and attentive to its userbase's questions and concerns.
testimonialsList.author: DJTiki ğŸŒ´

testimonialsList.text: Your app has really ticked all the boxes for us and I've been impressed with the level of configuration options, it's the most full featured one that I've come across so, can't fault it!
testimonialsList.author: schmoopy101

testimonialsList.text: I am a server builder. i make them for friends that need them for work/ events/ community out reach to help their cause. This bot is amazingly well created! I use it a lot in servers! It is so easy to maneuver and use. It is great for people who are not used to bots/ discord. Makes it easy to learn how to use! I just recently discovered it a few weeks back, and have deleted all other survey bots and replaced it with this one haha.
testimonialsList.author: risingblossom92
testimonialsList.role: ğ‘°ğ‘«ğ‘º ã€˜ IrÎ±m DeÄ± Sumus ã€™

testimonialsList.text: Used this bot with over 400 users to make a trivia month every day of last month and worked out great! I was making surveys with pictures, that had multiple options and then feeding the excel file I got from the bot at the end of the day to compile together a months worth of excel files, then made a leaderboard from that information!
testimonialsList.author: Bezarius

testimonialsList.text: Subo has been a joy to use since I have started my premium subscription. Recurring polls and other polls can run on a scheduled time frame that I need and the developers are actively working on the project. The developers frequently and quickly respond to tickets and helped me when there was a bug in the software due to the length of polls that I was running. Subo is a great alternative to Google Forms or Microsoft Forms for those who want their polls and surveys directly integrated as well as some ai analysis for longer surveys to identify what people want most in written responses.
testimonialsList.author: ryangrg422

testimonialsList.text: thanks for your brilliant app! I use it every week
testimonialsList.author: jpob

ctaSubtitle: No credit card. No setup hassle. Just jump in and play around with few limitations. Do more with paid plans when you're ready.
successDescription: Please contact the Team by email or on our Discord server with your Discord Server ID or name and we'll upgrade your server ASAP.

successSteps.title: Add Subo to Your Server
successSteps.desc: If you haven't already, invite Subo to your Discord server and accept the suggested permissions.

successSteps.title: Send your Server details to the Subo Team
successSteps.desc: Notify the Subo Team with your Discord Server ID or name. You can contact the Support Team by email or on our Discord server.

successSteps.title: Join Our Support Server
successSteps.desc: While you wait, join our support community to see examples, stay updated with new features or ask questions. Check our Tutorials to get started and make the most out of Subo.

successSteps.title: Verify that your Subscription is Active
successSteps.desc: Once you've sent your server details, the Subo Team will upgrade your server as soon as they can and will confirm your upgrade. Be patient, as it requires some manual verification. You can verify your upgrade was activated by using the /premium command in your Discord server.

faqList.question: Why do I need to choose between Stripe and Discord?
faqList.answer: We support Discord's native App Store, which is more convenient for many users, but the Discord App Store doesn't offer multiple server and annual subscriptions, so we also created a Stripe solution for that.

faqList.question: Why do I have to wait for my premium subscription to become active?
faqList.answer: Stripe collects your email address to create an account for you, but we can't connect this email address with your Discord server. This means we need to manually verify your account before activating your premium subscription. We intend to automate this process in the future, but for now, we appreciate your patience.

faqList.question: How do I find my server ID?
faqList.answer: You can find your server ID by right-clicking on your server name in Discord and selecting 'Copy Server ID'. If you don't see this option, you may need to enable Developer Mode in your Discord settings (which we recommend anyway).

faqList.question: How do I change or cancel a subscription?
faqList.answer: You can manage your subscription at any time via the Stripe Billing Portal or Discord Store, depending on how you upgraded. To access the Stripe Billing Portal, you will need to log in with the email address you used to pay for the upgrade. See links in footer.

faqList.question: What happens if I cancel my premium subscription?
faqList.answer: Once the end of your subscription period (month, year) comes, your bot will be switched back to the free version of Subo. You will still be able to use Subo, but with the limitations of the free tier.  If you have a project live, it may stop if you reach your maximum allowance for respondents or responses. If you have too many projects on your account, you may have to delete some before you are allowed to create new ones.

tiers.name: PREMIUM
tiers.description: For power users and mid-sized servers!

tiers.name: VIP
tiers.description: For larger servers and generous supporters!

tiers.name: CUSTOM
tiers.description: Your own bot, avatar and description with VIP features!

tableData:
Answers
Answer = Respondent x Question (e.g. 60 respondents answering 5 questions = 300 answers)

Active surveys
Total surveys & polls stored. Delete old surveys to stay in a smaller tier.

Concurrent surveys
Surveys open or scheduled at the same time

Invitation / Thank You Customization
Customize invitations (footer, thumbnail, color), results and thank you messages

New response Notifications
New responses posted in a private channel with optional ping

Delete some responses
Delete some or all responses from a survey or poll
Advanced survey builder: min/max open text length & numeric values

AI credits
Credits are needed to generate survey drafts with /draft and to summarize open-ended responses

âœ—
1 role server-wise for ever answering any poll/survey
Role rewards based on monthly XP

XP system
including leaderboard and up to 5 role rewards based on overall XP

footer.brandDescription: The best survey bot for Discord communities. Run polls, collect more feedback in conversations, reward participants with XP and roles.
